is designated as a special week
or weeks lat that same time)
for particular groups and persons
to observe one thing or another.


l have studied many calendars
of events. locally and nationally.
and failed to discover a time
set aside for being kind to peo-
Pile.


The pickle makers, the book
beer drinkers, the pretzel twist
ers. the sausage grinders, the
heart fund. the mental healthier,
the book lovers, the peppermint
candy stripers and the pole Sit
tiers have spots on the calendars.


You can round up few bird
watchers. girlwatchers, clock
watchers and skywatchers--all
will have some time out for spe-
cial praise or publicity.


Hardly anyone or anything In
this great, big, beautiful universe
has been ignored. We have pro-
grams to crown the cotton maid.
the milk maid, the onion maid,
the lager maid, the wine maid,
the maids perfect maid and even
mothers in law queens.


Little people. big people, mid
die sized people, and those called
average people wait for special
events to exercise their special
talents or shortcomings.


1t Is a way Of living which be-
gins in early childhood. Babies
are subjects Of baby contests.
The coos and cries Of wee ones
are merely the beginning in the
preparation for higher circles.
When child reaches ten, he has
been some king Tor a queen. If
a female). s%@


AS teens grow they form clubs
or join clubs already existing
some have been members as
children. They vie for honors
such as who owns the most freck-
les; who is the best pie baker
or who can stand on his head
for ten minutes.


An announcer reported last
week that Governor Paul Fannin
signs more than 200 proclama-
lions every year as the execu-
tive leader Of our state.


Many Of the days and weeks
proclaimed rarely get vide
spread notice. However, some
of the aims Of many Of the groups
are worthwhile and many persons
are aided by their efforts.


One Of the most important
days set aside is Mothers Day.
This Sunday is probably remem-
bered by as many citizens as any
one single time Of the year. |
think 1t Is overdone by SO much
commercialism--too bad that our
Mothers only have one day.


Say. | forgot to mention the
sore-really sore--and aggravat-
ing point about all Of these spe-
cial days and weeks. | am worn
to a thin piece of human flesh
because Of cat Ia four footed
one).


This week is "Be Kind to AMI
NAL Week." All week especially
at night when we are retiring
for the night-the cat begins to wall
and whine. 1t sounds like baby
and 1t bowls and yells for hours.
Now / ask you-how can | have
kind thoughts for such a beast7


Before all Of the days and weeks
are chosen for 1865 propose we
have a Be Kind to and Help Peo-
pie Week. Also. ] strongly urge
you to remember your mother
before the second Sunday In May.


Why not7


~~~~~~~~~~~~N

Siqhts and Sounds
ELoIsE BANKS


Be Kind Week
